name: Triamcinolone Acetonide

indications.text: triamcinolone acetonide cream , usp 0.1 % indicated relief inflammatory pruritic manifestations corticosteroid-responsive dermatoses .

contraindications.text: apply triamcinolone acetonide cream , usp 0.1 % affected area two three times daily . rub gently .

warningsAndPrecautions: triamcinolone acetonide cream , usp 0.1 % : tubes containing 15 g ( ndc 71656-042-15 ) , 30 g ( ndc 71656-042-30 ) , 80 g ( ndc 71656-042-80 ) ; jars containing 454 g ( ndc 71656-042-16 ) cream . storage store 20°c 25°c ( 68°f 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . avoid freezing . distributed : saptalis pharmaceuticals , llc . hauppauge , ny 11788 ppm-0032 rev . 09/24-r2
adverseReactions: topical corticosteroids contraindicated patients history hypersensitivity components preparations .
indications_original: Triamcinolone acetonide cream, USP 0.1% is indicated for the relief of the inflammatory and pruritic manifestations of corticosteroid-responsive dermatoses.
contraindications_original: Apply triamcinolone acetonide cream, USP 0.1% to the affected area two to three times daily. Rub in gently.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Triamcinolone Acetonide Cream, USP 0.1%: tubes containing 15 g (NDC 71656-042-15), 30 g (NDC 71656-042-30), and 80 g (NDC 71656-042-80); and jars containing 454 g (NDC 71656-042-16) of cream.

 
                  
                     Storage
                  
                  Store at 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Avoid freezing.
                  
                  Distributed by:
                  
                     Saptalis Pharmaceuticals, LLC.
                  
                  Hauppauge, NY 11788
                  PPM-0032
                  Rev. 09/24-R2
adverseReactions_original: Topical corticosteroids are contraindicated in those patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any of the components of the preparations.
